Choose how the Configure Products page groups your product features.
Sections: The Configure Products page shows all your product features on one page.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
Related Product: The option is an independent product that can also be related to a bundle. Useful for cross-selling or upselling product options that users can add to the bundle while controlling the option’s quantity independently. Related Product options can’t be required.

comments.content: Related products are useful for cross-selling, which is exactly what they are asking for.. they want to add-on options without re-configuring the bundle.

There is a catch: WARNING If a required or bundled product option has a Type field of Related Product, Salesforce CPQ treats the product option like it’s a component. Its quantity is multiplied by the parent product’s quantity, and its quantity isn’teditable in the quote line editor.
